# direction

**Instance Property**

The permitted direction of the swipe for this gesture recognizer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var direction: UISwipeGestureRecognizer.Direction { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default direction is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISwipeGestureRecognizer/Direction-swift.struct/right]. See descriptions of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISwipeGestureRecognizer/Direction-swift.struct] constants for more information.

## Related Documentation

- **Event Handling Guide for UIKit Apps**

## Configuring the gesture

- **numberOfTouchesRequired**: The number of touches necessary for swipe recognition.
- **UISwipeGestureRecognizer.Direction**: The direction of the swipe.
